docs.summary: An input element for setting time of day.
description: A time picker is configured to receive string representation of 24-hour time, e.g., "16:00".

docs.summary:
Sets or gets the amount of minutes the time picker steps
on inrement and decrement.
description: Setting the `step` property makes the behavior of both the tickers
and the keyboard up/down arrows to increment and decrement the minutes
by the step count. When the input focus is on the hours, it will change
value by 1 hour, regardless of the step value.
You can also set an element's `step` property in the Editor using the Settings panel.

docs.summary: Sets or gets whether the time picker uses 12/24 hour format.
description: + true: will show am/pm, e.g., 04:00 pm
You can also set an element's `useAmPmFormat` property in the Editor using the Settings panel.
